    MSG([[ But that's exactly why I don’t want to see her now. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s really unfair. This kind of thing is destined to make me fall in love. ]])

 "It’s cold today, please wear this. I’m trained, so I’m fine." ]])

    【Lira】With jacket, no make-up・Blush

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI02ea")

    MSG([[ Erika took off her jacket and put it on me. ]])

    MSG([[ She wouldn’t let me walk on the street side, often says, “Ladies first.” Erika sometimes acts manly like this, so I’ve gotten used to it. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR05aa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0978.wav")

    【Lira】With jacket, no make-up・Normal
 "...Huh?" ]])

    【Lira】With jacket, no make-up・Surprised

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI02fa")
